attributes.action: Ensure local goverment do not charge for waste disposal and have adequate waste collection and recycling systems.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently local councils are setting up half hearted waste recycling systems and combining this with alternative weeks green and household waste collection. This collection frequency is totally inadequate without full recycling facilities. Bi weekly collections encourages vermin

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
